div.h5: ResponsiveEd, a nonprofit organization, operates more than 70 tuition-free public schools throughout Texas and Arkansas. Click below to find a campus near you or scroll down to learn more about our Family of Schools.

a.class: nectar-button large see-through-2 has-icon wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeInUp fadeInUp

div.p: At ResponsiveEd, we seek to be responsive to the needs of the community. In keeping with this goal, we offer a variety of educational options—educational “brands”—that reflect the diverse interests, goals, and learning styles of the students within the communities we serve.

div.p: LEWISVILLE, Texas – April 6, 2020 – ResponsiveEd was awarded a $41 million grant from The United States Department of Education, to expand Career and Technical Education (CTE) courses at...

a.p: COVID-19 Texas Parent/Student Update | In response to Governor Abbott’s recent executive order, ResponsiveEd schools will remain closed and remote learning will continue for the remainder of the school year in accordance with TEA guidelines: https://bit.ly/2XJxx77.
Scholar Spotlight | Our Premier High School - Irving South senior found a way to help her community during this challenging time. #WayProudWednesday

💛👏 A big round of applause for our Tyler Classical Academy teacher Mrs. Marsh and scholar Miranda! The duo was inspired to write a children’s book together to help young kids understand social distancing. https://bit.ly/2KcQ7MN
